name: desktime-hack
description: Its a hacking tool for desktime active time tracking app

desktime-hack.randomTextGeneratorAPI.description: Specifies the option to invoke a API to get random texts to type in a file.

desktime-hack.switchBetweenRandomFileGen.description: Specifies the option to switch back and forth between generating files randomly or traverse available files.

desktime-hack.maxTimeToBeInAFile.description: Controls the dealy in minute after which writing will be stopped in current file and a new file will created.

desktime-hack.filterFileTypes.description: Specifies the option to filter certain file types on which the operations will perform.

desktime-hack.moveMouse.description: Controls the behavious of moving mouse over VS Code.

desktime-hack.mouseMovementPixel.description: Controls the behaviour of the number of pixels someone want to move on every operation.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
